title: Which numbers should replace the question marks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let the unknown number be X=? Then the observed number be X,36,68,12,99,43,75,52 ,now we substract one number from another to get the relation now X-36 =X-36………….…………………… Equation (1). And, 36–68= -32……………………… Equation (2) and ,68–12=56…………………………Equation (3)… and,12–99=-87………………………….. Equation (4) and ,99–43=56………………………….. Equation (5) and,43–75=-32………..………………. Equation (6) and,75–52=23………………………….. Equation (7) Now,we observed from above equation that Equation (2)=(6)and,6+2=8 Equation (3)=(5)and,3+5=8 also 1+7=8,so Equation (1)=(7) now we get the equation below that , X-36= 23 X=23+36=59 So the required number is 59 …………………………………………………………………
